title: MATCH PAIRS! v1.1 [Android] [APK] [GAME]
description:
Looking for the best game in this genre? You found it!

In MATCH PAIRS you match up 2 similar cards. Can you memorize the card pairs? Test your memory. Also known as Match Up, Concentration, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, Pexeso, Memory or Pairs.

All of the cards are laid face down on a surface and two cards are flipped face up over each turn. The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. Pairs is an especially good education game for children and adults.

Play against a friend, play with your kids on one screen! MATCH PAIRS supports 2 player multiplayer mode (planned).

High score (planned):
Beat the high score and be 1st! This game is designed to count both, the number of clicks and time passed! Concentrate and memorize the pairs, but be fast!
